Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12000 by you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the chance to own it at a special introductory price of $11000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to respond promptly to secure this fantastic deal. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of serving you with our top-tier product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
